words.ex: They stayed in a quaint little cottage by the river.
The committee found itself in a quandary over the conflicting proposals.
The court moved to quash the earlier ruling.
The announcement helped quell growing public anxiety.
His querulous tone made the discussion increasingly difficult.
She queried the accuracy of the final report.
They spent hours quibbling over minor details.
The volcano remained quiescent for decades.
The film is considered the quintessential example of the genre.
He ended the meeting with a light‑hearted quip.
One of her quirks was collecting antique keys.

words.cz: idealistic natolik, že je to nepraktické
words.ex: Their quixotic plan collapsed under real‑world constraints.
She gave him a quizzical look after his unexpected remark.
He found poetry in the most quotidian moments of life.
